cast.overview: Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers.
cast.title: Dangal
cast.character: Head of Department of the NSA

details.biography: Shishir Sharma is an Indian film and television actor. He played in Zee TV's show Ghar Ki Lakshmi Betiyann. He is known for played the role of Jagmohan Prasad in Yahaaan Main Ghar Ghar Kheli.
details.name: Shishir Sharma
